subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Lions are developing a reputation as the N.F.L.’s dirtiest team after a raft of reputation-tarnishing incidents, including the suspension of Ndamukong Suh.
snippet: The Detroit Lions are developing a reputation as the N.F.L.’s dirtiest team after a raft of reputation-tarnishing incidents, including the suspension of Ndamukong Suh.
